casebody.data:
JOHN ALDEN LIFE
v.
NC INS. GUARANTY. No. 66P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2004. Christopher J. Blake, Joseph E. Eason, for NC Insurance Guaranty Association. Allen Mills, for John Alden Life Ins. Co. Kevin Benedict, Raleigh, Suzanne Shakian, for National Conference of Insurance Guaranty Funds.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of February 2004 by National Conference of Insurance Guaranty Funds for Leave to File Amicus Curiae Brief in Support of North Carolina Insurance Guaranty Association:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of April 2004."
